name: Nasu
description:
Nasu is a logic platformer game about climbing and growing vines. On contact with the platform, Nasu releases a seed and the two seeds grows a vine that collects points. 
Reach the top of a level with as many points as you can!

Architecture
Singleplayer game in Unity Engine.with two-players rooms. Made in mind for mobile phones.

Assets
Sprites, code and effects are made by us during HuuugeGameJam. 
Sounds and music are on cc0 license mixed by us.

Business model
Game focused on mobile devices so player can watch advertisements after falling down or to double the points after the level.
